Name: PiiSim
About the game: Description This game with absurd humor. Pee in the toilet, break the toilet, washing machine, make a hole in the wall, piss the police, destroy the city. Make a Wet Apocalypse! Features Random elements Few text and intuitive interface One-time gameplay takes 15-20 minutes There is a world leaderboard and friend leaderboard 5 levels of gameplay Over 100 types of various targets, including hostile ones
